::Feline::

She got blasted back in the driver's seat.  She was plastered to the 
seat. Her ears were not stuck against the side of her head. "Yikes!" 
was all she could manage to get out.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He watched CyberShark fly.
> "That works. Oh, when I said gas, I ment gasoline. I work like a 
real
> Earth car, I need fuel." He got an idea.
> "Hold on!" He excelerated to 210 MPH, with the cockpit still open.
